MemberSignature.Value: public static bool IsLeftNavigation (this Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.ISkipNavigation skipNavigation);
.method public static hidebysig bool IsLeftNavigation(class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.ISkipNavigation skipNavigation) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function IsLeftNavigation (skipNavigation As ISkipNavigation) As Boolean
static member IsLeftNavigation : Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.ISkipNavigation -> bool

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the specified skip navigation represents the left side of the relationship.
Docs.returns: if it represents the left side.
Docs.remarks: The designation of left and right is arbitrary but deterministic. This method exists primarily to avoid configuring the same many-to-many relationship from both of its ends.
